title: VIP ZERO 最后那个给东西的怎么配置
author: zhouwei8725
txt_content:
不知道每个都是干什么的  
vip_items:
- vip,0,264,1,none
- vip,0,35:3,1,none
- vip,0,35,1,none
- vip,0,potion:poison:true:10:1,1,blindness-10:1
- vip,0,$,1000,none
- vip,0,xp,10,none
- vip,0,cmd,say @Player Muito bom!
- vip,0,310-311-312-313,1,protection-4
- vip,0,msg,Oi @player &3tudo bom&4?
- vip,0,276,1,sharpness-3-knockback-2-name-&4Legendary @player-desc-&3desc 1-desc-&c@player

求指教

replies.author: q691021659
replies.txt_content:
举个例子  vip,0,264,1,none
VIP=VIP组的名字
0=不懂 应该关系不大
264=物品ID
1=数量
none=附加属性   none的意思应该是没有附加

还有什么不懂可以问我

replies.author: zhouwei8725
replies.txt_content:
尼克尼 发表于 2015-2-12 12:32
方块的id。
有的 没有ID啊~ 说全点行不~谢了·

replies.author: 尼克尼
replies.txt_content:
vip_items:
- vip,0,264,1,none
- vip,0,35:3,1,none
- vip,0,35,1,none
- vip,0,potion:poison:true:10:1,1,blindness-10:1
- vip,0,$,1000,none
- vip,0,xp,10,none
- vip,0,cmd,say @Player Muito bom!
- vip,0,310-311-312-313,1,protection-4
- vip,0,msg,Oi @player &3tudo bom&4?
- vip,0,276,1,sharpness-3-knockback-2-name-&4Legendary @player-desc-&3desc 1-desc-&c@player
里面的：0、276那些都是物品的id，你可以随便设置

replies.author: q691021659
replies.txt_content:
一并给你说一下吧vip_items:
- vip,0,264,1,none
- vip,0,35:3,1,none
- vip,0,35,1,none
- vip,0,potion:poison:true:10:1,1,blindness-10:1     potion 药水
- vip,0,$,1000,none      钱
- vip,0,xp,10,none           经验
- vip,0,cmd,say @Player Muito bom!             cmd命令   say 公告   @player玩家名字  muito bom
- vip,0,310-311-312-313,1,protection-4         
- vip,0,msg,Oi @player &3tudo bom&4?          mag这个好像是私聊的命令吧
- vip,0,276,1,sharpness-3-knockback-2-name-&4Legendary @player-desc-&3desc 1-desc-&c@player  
这个是给武器附加附魔和名字   具体的我也懒得看了  你按他的空格分开一步一步的看就能看懂

replies.author: q691021659
replies.txt_content:
zhouwei8725 发表于 2015-2-12 13:20
vip,0,msg,Oi @player &3tudo bom&4?  能解释下么 尤其这个OI
mas是私聊   也就是说他会私聊你  并且说出Oi @player &3tudo bom&4?这么一段话  OI应该只是这个句子的组成部分  不是命令什么的

replies.author: zhouwei8725
replies.txt_content:
q691021659 发表于 2015-2-12 14:56
mas是私聊   也就是说他会私聊你  并且说出Oi @player &3tudo bom&4?这么一段话  OI应该只是这个句子的组 ...
ok 灰常明白~ 给个好
